course.title: PSY 3135 Social Development of the Child (3 units)
course.desc: Study of children's social relationships and social interactions from infancy to puberty. Influence of the family, home, school, peers, and society on the development of children as social beings. Current research in social development of the child.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: 54 university units including PSY 1101, PSY 1102, (PSY 2105 or PSY 2114).
